doc.title: Boulevard Noir
doc.plot: Failing music manager Alan Lane's last hope for success lies in the past he was more than happy to forget, when he accompanied Boulevard Noir, a synthesizer band, on a low budget tour of the USA in 1982. In the wilds of New Mexico, in a seedy motel, the bitter in-fighting and simmering disagreements with their manager come to a head, sending the already hilariously chaotic tour into an increasingly disastrous downwards spiral.
